vulnerability_findings.name: reentrancy-eth
vulnerability_findings.message:
Reentrancy in MONEY_BOX.Collect (0xbe4041d55db380c5ae9d4a9b9703f1ed4e7e3888.sol#49-62):
	External calls:
	- msg.sender.call.value(_am)() (0xbe4041d55db380c5ae9d4a9b9703f1ed4e7e3888.sol#56-60)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- Acc (0xbe4041d55db380c5ae9d4a9b9703f1ed4e7e3888.sol#58)
